cascade.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a small steep waterfall that is one of several together
cascade.translation[0].definitions[1].de: something that hangs down in large quantities
cascade.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Her hair fell over her shoulders in a cascade of curls.
cascade.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to flow, fall, or hang down in large quantities
cascade.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Her thick black hair cascaded down below her waist.
Gallons of water cascaded over the side of the bath.
cascade.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to pass information or skills to people at a lower level in your organization, or to be passed down in this way
cascade.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: This information will be cascaded down to employees through their line managers.
